pages.text: Leaf is a projectile spell form.$(br)$(t:Effect of Spell Attributes on Functional Spells)$(li)$(#6C7B8B)Magical Efficacy：$(/t)$(li2)$(#00CED1)Force：Increases with light brightness$()$(t:The range of functional spells is unaffected)$(li2)$(#EE6363)Range：1.0$(/t)$()$(li2)$(#FFB90F)Duration：Increases with light brightness$()$(br2)The force and duration of the subsequent spell will vary with the brightness of the lighting. The force and duration of the spells will be highest when the lighting is sufficient.
